text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Commission" means compensation that:
is due to a sales representative from a principal; and
accrues at:
a specified amount for each order or sale; or
a rate expressed as a percentage of the dollar amount that a sales representative:

"Principal" means a sales corporation, partnership, proprietorship, or other business entity that:
distributes, imports, manufactures, or produces a product for wholesale;
enters into a contract with a sales representative to solicit a wholesale order for the product; and
pays the sales representative wholly or partly by commission.

section.section:
"Sales representative" means a person who:
enters into a contract with a principal to solicit in the State a wholesale order; and
is paid wholly or partly by commission.

"Sales representative" does not include a person who:
buys a product or places an order for a product for resale by that person; or
sells or takes an order for the sale of a product to an ultimate buyer.
